As of April 15, 2024, I'm spending all my time on these things:

- Staying at home pretty much 24/7 (STILL) because of the COVID-19 pandemic
- Raising 6 kids (16.5, 14, 11.5, 8.5, 6, and 2) and trying to stay sane ([family blog](http://www.heissatopia.com/))
- Living in Atlanta and working as an assistant professor in the [Department of Public Management and Policy](https://aysps.gsu.edu/public-management-policy/) at the [Andrew Young School of Policy Studies](https://aysps.gsu.edu/) at [Georgia State University](https://www.gsu.edu/)
- Teaching [data visualization](https://datavizf22.classes.andrewheiss.com/), [program evaluation](https://evalsp24.classes.andrewheiss.com/), [comparative public administration](https://compasp23.classes.andrewheiss.com/),  [nonprofit management](https://nonprofitf22.classes.andrewheiss.com), and [microeconomics](https://econs23.classes.andrewheiss.com/) at the [Andrew Young School of Policy Studies](https://aysps.gsu.edu/) at [Georgia State University](https://www.gsu.edu/)
- Working as a part time data science mentor for [Posit Academy](https://posit.co/products/enterprise/academy/)
- Converting my dissertation into multiple articles and sending them out to journals + continuing [my research on authoritarianism and international NGOs](https://www.ingoresearch.org/)
- Working on several articles on NGO restrictions with [Suparna Chaudhry](http://www.suparnachaudhry.com/) and [Marc Dotson](https://marriottschool.byu.edu/directory/details?id=50683)
- Reading some sort of religiously themed text every day ([books](https://www.goodreads.com/review/list/2733632-andrew-heiss?shelf=religious))
